about_the_game:
In Floating Star, you will play as a lone traveler, floating in the galaxy while exploring the boundaries of human civilization.

Travel through the boring, dilapidated galaxy, and negotiate with the numb space colonists. Manage supplies, weapons and equipment, defeat enemies, and find the end of your journey.

Inspired by FTL, EVE and some other games.

Key Features:

  • Story Driven -- Somehow, humans have spread to every corner of this galaxy. Negotiate with them to obtain supplies and information. Different choices may bring different consequences.

  • Random Galaxy -- Star maps and events will be randomly generated for each game, and the floating path is planned by you.

  • Strategic Equipment and Resource Management -- Inventory space and spaceship slots are limited, but the available ammunition, supplies, weapons and equipment are endless! It's up to you to choose.

Feel free to make any feedback!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

publishers: 上海文青娱乐消费总咖啡厅
short_description: Play as a lone space traveler, floating in the galaxy while exploring the boundaries of human civilization.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
